subject: How to make your girlfriend happy
body:
Looking for an effective and cheap solution? Tired with your sexual problems? 
Go to the site
U can restore your health right now. Doesn't matter what the problem is - we pills to cure everything. Erection Dysfunction, Weight loss, Anti-Depressant, Antibiotics and even more! Fantastic low prices! 
Click here to be the best lover in the world!
Lowest prices on the web, only licensed and quality pills.
With best regards,
Zoe Middleton
 
 
Ia ne prichinil im vreda, soobshchil on, priacha Klinok pod plashch. Menia sejchas trevozhit drugoj moment. Nesmotria na obshchij bardak, Dorozhka k kasse vse zhe byla nemnogo raschishchena, chto ukazyvalo na priznaki Zhivogo prisutstviia. No sejchas Altares byl slishkom zaniat svoimi mysliami, chtoby obrashchat Vnimanie na stol oskorbitelnoe i neumestnoe povedenie plemiannika v prisutstvii Ego samogo Verhovnogo maga. 
Ty mozhesh obiasnit bolee podrobno? Chastokol oranzhevyh klykov tusklo blesnul v temnote, kogda on povernul Golovu ko mne. Steny, potolok, ostatki mebeli, kover Vse mgnovenno pokrylos tonkim sloem serebristogo ineia, iz kabineta potianulo Ledianym holodom. Bolshe illiuzii, chem Dejstvitelnyh fizicheskih izmenenij. Esli zhelaesh, ia mogu Ih vyzvat, no ty ved ne hochesh uvidet ih vseh riadom s soboj? Ia uzhasnulsia, predstaviv sebia v okruzhenii sonma klykastyh fizionomij, Pod pristalnymi vzgliadami soten zvezd-glaz. Tonkoe zelenoe zhalo lazernogo lucha vpilos v centr massivnoj Urodlivoj ladoni, i chudovishchnye palcy okrasilis blednymi blikami otrazheniia. A potom, vozmozhno, eta informaciia okazalas namerenno Stertoj Nkotom, tak kak vo vremia sliianiia ot Bigmana ia ee uzhe ne poluchil. Nadeius, ty uzhe znaesh o psi-maiake, Vzhivlennom v tvoj cherep? Ego uzhe net, zadumchivo progovoril ia. Shodi luchshe zajmis sedlom svoego drakha, chtoby Obezopasit svoiu goriacho liubimuiu zadnicu ot mozolej v dalnejshem puteshestvii. 
Dvizhenie Prokolda k glazu perehoda zamedlilos. Razgliadyvaia kolebliushcheesia Otrazhenie svoej nedovolnoj fizionomii na vodnoj poverhnosti, on vozmushchenno Fyrknul. Lico sheltianina Blestelo ot pota, guby razdvinulis v zlobnoj grimase, obnazhiv sverhostrye Klyki, v glazah gorela iarost. Teper, esli cherez troe sutok Ia ne poiavlius na Elti, spiashchij prosnetsia, i zariad vzryvchatki (kakoe-to tam Tochno dozirovannoe specizluchenie, chtob, ne daj nebo, ne postradali Okruzhaiushchie) razneset moj mozg na atomy. ejisuminyon VkRQW0dcU1B0RkFXVlBMH0dEVUFUQF9bWh9RUg==
